List of all members.

Detailed Description

The enet server class.

This class is only used by the game server. The EnetAddress.host value is always set to ENET_HOST_ANY. The EnetAddress.port value must be set by a call to setPort(). Then, you call eventLoop to wait connections.

The default port number is 50000. maxClient is by default set to 32.

Definition at line 153 of file enetserver.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Network::EnetServer::clientConnected ( const ENetAddress &  e  )  [signal]

A signal emitted when a client request a connection.

This signal is emitted when a ENet host request a connection. We don't know the client type and we can't tell if the connection is accepted or refused.

Parameters:
e The address of the server that request the connection
